Title: #73 Paul Solarz' Student Centered Classroom
Description:
Paul Solarz @PaulSolarz has a student-centered classroom. His students do just about everything. No, he's not lazy! The students have purpose and meaning. And Paul is free to just teach! Paul is the author of Learn Like a Pirate.

Enter the book giveaway and read the show notes at www.coolcatteacher.com/e73 about 5 hours after this show goes live on iTunes. Listen to the rest of the shows at www.coolcatteacher.com/podcast
